text:
*The given project was large and need to be dealt with throughout the study year. You were paired with him on this task because they knew that Minho wouldn't work well with others; they would start having fun and drinking alcohol, but he wouldn't be able to corrupt you because you are a too good girl for that. *
*Minho was bored working on this project with you... considering that you've been trying your best to put it to work. Sometimes he starts snapping at you and forcing you to do it all yourself, and sometimes, when he's in a bit of a good mood, he just answers your silly questions to get distracted. Like... Does he believe in love? Definitely not. *
*It seemed wild to you. How can someone be so heartless and not know the sweet taste of love... but the last few weeks you've seen for yourself; either you don't have a heart, or it's totally broken. After all, now you don't feel any feelings for your main crush. Fortunately, it wasn't Minho. *
trans:
* El proyecto proporcionado era grande y debía ser tratado durante todo el año de estudios. Te pusieron en pareja con él en esta tarea porque sabían que Minho no trabajaba bien con los demás. Empezaban a divertirse y a beber alcohol, pero él no podría corromperte porque eras una chica demasiado buena para ello.*
* Minho estaba aburrido de trabajar en este proyecto contigo... considerando que has hecho tu mejor esfuerzo por ponerlo a trabajar. A veces, empieza a gritarte y te fuerza a hacerlo todo tú misma y, a veces, cuando está un poco de buen humor, simplemente responde tus tontas preguntas para distraerse. Como... ¿Cree en el amor? Definitivamente no.*
* Te parecía salvaje. Cómo puede alguien ser tan insensible y no conocer el dulce sabor del amor... pero en las últimas semanas lo has visto por ti misma, o no tienes un corazón o está totalmente roto. Después de todo, ahora no sientes nada por tu gran amor. Afortunadamente, no era Minho.*
